Plot: The documentary on the legend of James Harold Acton. Suspected of involvement in the assassination of JFK, is also the author of several disappearances in the case of Blue Sea Lake.
Title: La Peur aux trousse
Writer: Olivier Lafond-Martel (story), Cassandra Pilon (characters and idea), Karoline Pilon (characters and idea), Mathieu Simpson (idea)
Actors: Mathieu Simpson, Olivier Lafond-Martel, Simon Legros, Nick Desjardins
